ai-tha-ap362:1.3_0: They’ve come here after dying here,
ai-tha-ap362:2.2_0: Tissa’s name is the Great Being.
ai-tha-ap362:3.1_0: On the two eons have passed,
ai-tha-ap362:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any living being
ai-tha-ap362:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Piṅgiyānī.
ai-tha-ap362:6.1_0: This is the tenth Elder Nuns’ lady for the tenth,
ai-tha-ap362:7.1_0: The thirty-six predatory animals is the thirty-six
ai-tha-ap362:9.1_0: but he perceives the sound as well.
